entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.40
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove subquery for companies.account_id column
  • v5.10.40 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10149

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.39...v5.10.40

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.41
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for expense imports
  • Working on Payment Means for CII
  • Fixes for smtp_port cast
  • Fixes for parallel tests
  • Update client balance after merge
  • Add amount filters for expense
  • Additional logging for license keys
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10157
  • Websockets: New notifications by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10154
  • v5.10.41 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10158

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.40...v5.10.41
